lead_paragraph: Panthers defensive end Jared Allen, a four-time All-Pro who played 12 seasons in the N.F.L. and twice led the league in sacks, announced his retirement in his own unique way — sitting atop his horse.
snippet: Panthers defensive end Jared Allen, a four-time All-Pro who played 12 seasons in the N.F.L. and twice led the league in sacks, announced his retirement in his own unique way — sitting atop his horse.
abstract: Carolina Panthers defensive end Jared Allen announces his retirement from NFL in Twitter video; other NFL news noted.
